system.description: You can move, attack, and move again before your foes can react.
system.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, base attack bonus +4
system.benefit: As a full-round action, you can move up to your speed and make a single melee attack at any point during your movement. You must move at least 10 feet before and after your attack. You may not take a 5-foot step before, during, or after this action.
system.special: A fighter may select Spring Attack as one of his fighter bonus feats.
